org.naomi.regex

Class Pretty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.naomi.regex.Pretty

  • public class Pretty
extends Object
    This class governs the display of regular expressions (see getRegularExpression and setPretty), to generate expressions which are more human readable—or, more precisely, less unreadable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Pretty.BadPrettyException
      Thrown when an instance of Pretty has a bad field

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean comments
      When true, terse comments are generated; when false no comments are generated.
      CharSequence indenter
      The indentation per level.
      boolean pretty
      When true, getRegularExpression attempts to generate a more human readable expression; when false, all other fields are ignored and getRegularExpression generates a dense expression.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pretty()
      generates a new Pretty with pretty == true, indenter == 6 spaces and comments == true.
      Pretty(boolean prettyArg)
      generates a new Pretty with pretty == prettyArg, indenter == 6 spaces and comments == true.
      Pretty(Pretty other) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • pretty

        public boolean pretty
        When true, getRegularExpression attempts to generate a more human readable expression; when false, all other fields are ignored and getRegularExpression generates a dense expression. The default is false.

      • indenter

        public CharSequence indenter
        The indentation per level. The default is 6 spaces.

      • comments

        public boolean comments
        When true, terse comments are generated; when false no comments are generated. The default is true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pretty

        public Pretty()
        generates a new Pretty with pretty == true, indenter == 6 spaces and comments == true.

      • Pretty

        public Pretty(boolean prettyArg)
        generates a new Pretty with pretty == prettyArg, indenter == 6 spaces and comments == true.

      • Pretty

        public Pretty(Pretty other)
